Bad game but worth the play time you'll end up putting in

People keep saying that the community is really toxic, but that's not entirely true. At low ranks, between 20-12 is pretty enjoyable, especially with friends. Once you start getting to lower ranks is when you start to see the toxic side of the community. Overall, the play style is unique and it can be rather intense as well. I recommend this game for those looking for strategy/horror game, tell some friends to get the game too and it can be twice as fun. However... Some things I don't like include the fact that each killer/survivor has their own dlc which can be pretty pricey in the long run and the "Rift" or battlepass system is just too much. If you don't intend on buying dlc then this probably isn't the game for you as it just isn't as fun. In conclusion, they did a pretty good job so far.

殺手太多突進技能跟遠距離攻擊技能， 且冷卻時間不足3秒。
遊戲對新手不友善，新手沒什麼技能時，殺手各種一下倒地　遠距攻擊　傳送　直接在新手面前出現並一下打倒。
之後練滿了會比較平衡。如果殺手變強的門檻很低。用白板殺手都可以打到滿技生存不要不要。

不建議購買，如果想買　需要連同DLC一起買，並且練滿　才有生存之地。

As fun as this game is to play with friends and others, there are some side notes to add before you consider this game:
- You MUST have thick skin and be resilient to this toxic community; they'll mostly treat you like shit for no reason. Turn off chat when you're new to the game. You may find some dope people, but it's occasionally.
- DLC is fair, but a little overpriced. Wait for a sale to get some or in a bundle.
- Legendary skins and some skins in general are a rip off. They just make your character super fancy and that's it. Don't get it.  Save up for it.
- DO NOT get the battlepass UNLESS you really enjoy this game. Completing the battlepass will give you all credits back; good deal for experts, bad deal for noobs and casuals.
- This game won't go gentle on you for beginners, you must learn by yourself and on your free time to get remotely good at this game.
- There is no practice mode yet, except Kill Your Friends but you require friends to test stuff out.
- Play with friends, it's a shit ton better especially with Kill Your Friends. Access to every perk (not character) in the game at max rank. Perfect for testing, messing about, and practicing when you're new to the game. Can't stress this enough.
- This game is a bit buggy. It isn't game breaking like before but definitely annoying sometimes.

If you have no problem with this, this game is gonna be a blast for you. Pretty fun horror game. However, THIS ISN'T MEANT FOR COMPETITIVE!

Pros:
- Big roster of killers and survivors, even from iconic horror franchises.
- A lot of perks allowing you to make different builds for your killers and survivors.
- Fun since last update, if you're looking to play killer.

Cons:
- Unlocking characters + perks can be quite a grind.
- Takes quite some time to learn and get into.
- A lot of toxicity between killers and survivors.
- Cheaters every now and then (both sides).
- Last update made the game hard to enjoy for survivors as gen repair times have been increased and gen slowdown perks can easily be stacked.
- Soloqueue survivors have very low odds of escaping as of 6.1.0.
- Nurse (killer) if good has barely any counterplay.
- Lots of DC's and suicides on hooks by survivors as of 6.1.0.
- Camping and tunneling is very easy for killers creating an unfun experience.

Personal opinion:
As of the latest update playing killer has become more enjoyable, it feels a lot more like something to be afraid of and if playing killer was the only experience you can have in this game i would definitely recommend it. 

Sadly buffing killer comes at a costly price for the survivors. Playing survivor as of 6.1.0 can be boring and feel unfair because of reasons stated above, especially in soloqueue. Its very hard to enjoy the game as a survivor. BHVR needs to find a better balance before i can recommend this game.

Personally i wanted BHVR to buff killers as most felt weak and not like something to be feared, but they really went too far with this one.
Dont buy it

DBD como todos os jogos tem pontos positivos e negativos. É um dos jogos que eu não vou cansar tão cedo, as partidas são muito variadas e por mais que vc jogue com os mesmos perks e os mesmos survivors, acontece sempre algo diferente. 
Como algo negativo devo falar das atualizações, que embora tragam melhorias e diversificam o jogo (através de skins, novos mapas e sobreviventes, chegam sempre carregadas de bugs.
É uma relação de amor e ódio, diria que mais amor do que ódio xD
